name: Stay Out Of The Halls
description:
As a young boy, your mother always tells you to never leave your room after you go to bed. You've always been curious on why that is, but you never complained. You always do what mother tells you to do, but tonight is different. Tonight you decide to see why.

This is a short, first person horror game designed to be played roughly 5-20 minutes. Gamepad is supported. This is my first ever game project as a developer and I give my thanks if you enjoyed.
